transcript.speaker: interviewer
transcript.text: hi rohit, good morning. thanks for taking the time to speak with us today. this conversation will focus on your technical background as well as how you communicate your work and ideas. please feel free to explain things in your own words.

transcript.speaker: candidate
transcript.text: good morning. sure, ill try my best.

transcript.speaker: interviewer
transcript.text: lets begin with your most recent project. can you walk me through what the project was about and your role in it?

transcript.speaker: candidate
transcript.text: i worked on an application where i was responsible for fixing bugs and adding some features.

transcript.speaker: interviewer
transcript.text: can you pick one feature you worked on and explain the problem it solved?

transcript.speaker: candidate
transcript.text: it was related to a small change requested by the client. i dont remember the exact details now.

transcript.speaker: interviewer
transcript.text: thats okay. how did you understand the requirement for that feature?

transcript.speaker: candidate
transcript.text: my team lead explained it to me, and i followed the instructions.

transcript.speaker: interviewer
transcript.text: suppose you had to explain this feature to a non-technical stakeholder. how would you describe it?

transcript.speaker: candidate
transcript.text: i would try to explain it simply, but i usually find it difficult to explain technical things clearly.

transcript.speaker: interviewer
transcript.text: have you ever faced a situation where miscommunication caused an issue in a project?

transcript.speaker: candidate
transcript.text: there were some misunderstandings sometimes, but the team usually handled it.

transcript.speaker: interviewer
transcript.text: how do you usually communicate progress or blockers to your team?

transcript.speaker: candidate
transcript.text: i mostly update during meetings, but i dont go into much detail.

transcript.speaker: interviewer
transcript.text: can you give an example where you proactively communicated a risk or issue?

transcript.speaker: candidate
transcript.text: i cant recall a specific example right now.

transcript.speaker: interviewer
transcript.text: thank you for your honesty. do you have any questions for us?

transcript.speaker: interviewer
transcript.text: thank you, rohit. we appreciate your time and will get back to you with next steps.
